location.name: Zadarska Županija
location.activity-description: farmer activity data collection, edu/info workshops, public media capaigns, preparation for brending of agriculture products of ZD County

location.name: Sibenik
location.activity-description: info/edu workshops, participatory planning of the area, guidelines for sustainable development of Morinje bay

indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: - increased No of development projects ready for implementation and applying for EU and other development funds - increased No of LAGs and capacities within

baseline.comment: - low absorption capacity of EU funds in rural areas, no project ideas elaborated - no Local Action Groups (LAG) established with capacities to use EU funds

target.comment: - continued support to LAGs and FLAGs establishment and strengthening - continued support to agriculture producers and rural businesses in obtaining certified training and access to market

actual.comment: - Provided one-to –one advisory services for 8 LAGs in Dalmatia, primarily related to organizational management - 50 farmers increased capacities through continued support in provision of advisory services related to the management of the Farmers market in Zadar where on a weekly basis up to 50 farmers sell their products - 60 participants attended education and training events in rural / local development and agriculture from Zadar County - Methodology and the database format for collection data of farms activities and their production in the area of Zadar county developed with data of 170 family farms

target.comment: - catalogue of 30 rural development projects developed with 15 project ideas elaborated for EU funding - database of 100 rural stakeholders in Zadar county developed, as a basis for furhter programming and projects preprarion to be funded from rural development funds - Sign of quality and visual identity of agricultural and other rural products of Zadar County prepared

location.name: Vukovarsko-Srijemska Županija
location.activity-description: Coordination of activities between National Protection and Rescue Directorate, Croatian Public Institute for Health, Croatian Mine Action Center and Vukovar-Srijem County HQ for Rescue and Protection

indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: Needs assessment study for flooded minefields conducted Standard Operational Procedures for flooded minefields prepared and endorsed by stakeholders enhanced coordination between institutions in immediate response to floods

baseline.comment: no previous needs assessment for minefields-related issues in flooded areas weak coordination of national institutions involved in immediate response to floods

target.comment: Preapred needs assessment study for flooded minefields Standard Operational Procedures for flooded minefields prepared and endorsed by stakeholders Enhanced coordination between institutions in immediate response to floods Increased capacities at the country-level (Vukovar-Srijem) to immediate response to disasters

actual.comment: Study for flooded minefields prepared SOPs for flooded minefields prepared Enhanced coordination between Rescue and Protection Directorate, County-level rescue committee, Public Health Institute and Croatia Mine-action Centre

target.comment: Increased capacities at the country-level (Vukovar-Srijem) to immediate response to disasters

actual.comment: hands-on training conducted to county authorities responsible for immediate response to disasters with preparation of project proposals for funding from EU financial instruments (ECHO) to furhter enhance country DRR capacities. project completed in mid-2015.
